title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not show the Team entry.
EB: The expected behavior is for the context menu to display the Team entry.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the context menu on a .java file and another resource. 2. Verify that the Team entry is not present in the menu. It should be.
